column4: have you already tried enabling 3d acceleration, and installing guest additions?
dude, first off COOL NAME. I've enabled 3d and 2d accel (that helps a bit), I don't really know what the guest addtions are, can you explain to me what they are and how to install them?
hostkey + d should download and mount guest additions on a running guest os
guest additions are optimized drivers for virtualbox guests
Dude will this install an nvidia driver? Because I apprently can't install an nvidia driver in windows because my card isn't detected (I know it's emulated in the guest OS)
okay dude, I installed it what do I do now?
Okay dude I installed the guest addons and restarted and now the silverlight plugin keeps crashing!
since it's a virtual machine, the guest os won't be able to see your physical hardware, the best you can do is install drivers in the guest that work well with the virtualized hardware.
Does that mean I can't get real 3d/2d acceration? is that whats casuing the sliverlight plugin to keep crashing?
there do seem to be a lot of people experiennceing this same problem with silverlight and the 3d experimental drivers
dude I tried installing the drivers and enabling accelration and it crashed the plugin
netflix is still choppy , but it works without accelaraton enabled
dude, I enabled 2d accel but not 3d accel and it works WONDERFULLY
take a look at gnome fallback

Is that the "classic" version of gnome in ubuntu 11.10? If so, I tried it and hated it, there was no point in me using it because I hated the interface, and it didn't have the sticky windows on the side pannels things
so dude, is it possible to install gnome2 on 11.10 and have it work if I force the package to install or not
it's not the samee as classic
